events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your submitted resume and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills in software development and related experience.
A recruiter from our Engineering team has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, technical skills, and interest in the Software Engineer role, and the conversation was very promising.
You responded promptly to our screening call invite and confirmed your availability for the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss coding challenges and system design questions.
You completed the technical interview with our engineering team successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding ability.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 11 AM UTC. This session will focus on cultural fit and your career expectations.
You successfully completed the HR interview, where you articulated your career goals and alignment with our company's values.
An official job offer for the Software Engineer position has been sent to you, detailing the salary, benefits, and start date.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer and are looking forward to starting your new position with us.
Your onboarding process has officially started, including completing paperwork and attending orientation sessions to integrate into the engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with you fully onboarded as a Software Engineer at our company. Welcome aboard!
